ygData.msgSnippet: Gemini Dragon just looked down at Trainwreck and smirked before it shot a large amount of liquid nitrogen down onto the trainbot to freeze it. Gemini Dragon:

Gemini Dragon just looked down at Trainwreck and smirked before it 
shot a large amount of liquid nitrogen down onto the trainbot to 
freeze it.

Gemini Dragon: "All who are a threat to the future will die..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: I didn't know he was a gestalt, pardon me.
> 
> BIC: Train Wreck was not harmed a all by the electricity, but the 
fire burst a hole the size of a pie plate in his side.
> 
> Train Wreck: Okay, explanation on why you are attacking me, 
please?...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 10:00 PM
>   Subject: Re: Clash
> 
> 
>   Gestalts are allowed to be much bigger, Yan said 50 feet was the 
>   maximum and Gemini Dragon is 45 feet tall. its Gemini 1 and 2 
>   combined.
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > OOC: Train Wreck is 16 feet tall, Legendary Nemasis, and any 
bigger 
>   would be breaking the rules...
>   > 
>   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   >   Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 9:49 PM
>   >   Subject: Re: Clash
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   Gemini Dragon laughed evily as it flew forward and in front 
of 
>   >   Trainwreck out speeding it by a great deal. It quickly landed 
in 
>   >   front of it and unleashed a blast of fire and a blast of 
>   electricity 
>   >   at him. Gemin Dragon does happen to be a whole helluva lot 
bigger 
>   >   then him so running would be bad...
>   > 
>   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   >   > Train Wreck suddenly zoomed forward, avoiding the shots, 
his 
>   wheels 
>   >   making horrible screeching noises and eating through the 
ground. 
>   He 
>   >   was far from immobile, and although his wheels were damaged, 
he 
>   was 
>   >   still moving at some insane speed. Woahh's shots hit him in 
the 
>   rear 
>   >   and he swerved around. One of his wheels cracked as he zoomed 
>   back 
>   >   towards his former position and fires his cannon at Hot Rod 
>   once...
>   >   > 
>   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   >   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   >   >   Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 9:17 PM
>   >   >   Subject: Re: Clash
>   >   > 
>   >   > 
>   >   >   Gemini Dragon laughs from both heads as it looked down at 
the 
>   >   >   immobile Trainwreck(he has to be immobile if his wheels 
are 
>   >   smashed 
>   >   >   in.
>   >   > 
>   >   >   Gemini: "We are just getting warmed up... Literally! 
>   Amphorbasis!"
>   >   > 
>   >   >   With that one word each head began to crackle with energy 
as 
>   the 
>   >   tail 
>   >   >   did as well. A second later each head sent out an 
energizen 
>   beam 
>   >   of 
>   >   >   fire and liquid Nitrogen before the tail sent out a blast 
of 
>   >   >   electricity. Each blast then combined and swirled in the 
air 
>   >   before a 
>   >   >   singular massive blast flew straight down at Trainwreck. 
>   Nearby 
>   >   Zero 
>   >   >   Reaches methos and glares as he grabs his shoulder and 
spins 
>   him 
>   >   >   around to meet his glare.
>   >   > 
>   >   >   Zero: "So we meet again... perhaps we are destined to 
>   clash... 
>   >   Let's 
>   >   >   finish this!"
>   >   > 
>   >   >   With those words Zero slams his Energy blade into the 
blade 
>   of 
>   >   >   Methos's energy scythe each bot pushing into their 
weapons to 
>   >   through 
>   >   >   the other one off balanca.
>   >   > 
>   >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> 
wrote:
>   >   >   > After the attacks, Train Wreck's outer surface was 
black 
>   and 
>   >   his 
>   >   >   wheels were smashed in.
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   > Train Wreck: That all ya got?...

>   >   >   >   Vile smirks as he watches Trainwreck sustain the 
>   firepower, 
>   >   >   however he would 
>   >   >   >   not be able to do that for much longer. 
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   Vile: "Gemini, form the Gemini Dragon and teach this 
>   train to 
>   >   >   have respect 
>   >   >   >   for the past!" 
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   Gemini 1 and 2 nod before each leaps up high into the 
air 
>   and 
>   >   >   glows. The 
>   >   >   >   clouds above begins to swirl. Thunder begins to 
crackle 
>   as 
>   >   the 
>   >   >   sounds of 
>   >   >   >   transforming can be heard from a above a second later 
the 
>   >   clouds 
>   >   >   literally 
>   >   >   >   are sent scattering as a massive "meched out" double 
>   headed 
>   >   >   dragon around 45 
>   >   >   >   feet tall descends from them, its massive wings 
flapping 
>   >   wildly 
>   >   >   as 18 square 
>   >   >   >   like objects surround it. Both heads roar loudly and 
then 
>   >   speak 
>   >   >   at the same 
>   >   >   >   time their voice having an echo to it. 
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   Gemini Dragon: "Destruction shall be dealt unto 
all..." 
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   Vile looks up at the massive beast and smirks before 
he 
>   flys 
>   >   back 
>   >   >   and away 
>   >   >   >   from Trainwreck a nice Distance. Methos who is ontop 
of 
>   >   >   Trainwreck also looks 
>   >   >   >   up at Gemini Dragon. He then somehow sweatdrops and 
then 
>   flys 
>   >   off 
>   >   >   Trainwreck 
>   >   >   >   as if he was being chased by an army of Maximals with 
>   spark 
>   >   >   extractors. Up in 
>   >   >   >   the air the Gemini Dragon's right head shoots forward 
and 
>   >   >   unleashes a massive 
>   >   >   >   stream of flame at Trainwreck, at the same time the 
left 
>   head 
>   >   >   shoots out a 
>   >   >   >   nice large stream of liquid Nitrogen at the wheels of 
the 
>   >   chosen 
>   >   >   mafia 
>   >   >   >   member... From the front Vile unleashes another two 
>   >   antimatter 
>   >   >   blasts at 
>   >   >   >   Trainwreck.
